text: Shì tā [ān lā] zài yèjiān [nǐmen shuìmián shí] qǔ zǒu nǐmen de línghún [ér ràng nǐmen shuìmián], tā zhīdào nǐmen zài báizhòu suǒ zuò de yīqiè. Ránhòu, tā zài báizhòu shǐ nǐmen xǐng lái, yǐbiàn [nǐmen] wánchéng guīdìng de shòu xiàn. Ránhòu, nǐmen dōu jiāng guī dào tā nàlǐ qù, zuìhòu, tā jiāng bǎ nǐmen céngjīng suǒ zuò de gàosù nǐmen.
